about: With almost 3 years of work experience in the B2C industry , I am currently a Product Manager at Zomato Dining. Prior to this, I was handling Groww Balance (Consumer Payments team)& their Mutual Funds team. Having pursued Bachelor of Engineering (BE) along with a Minors in Finance from BITS Pilani, Iâ€™d believe I am a data-driven problem solver with an appetite for challenges using First Principle thinking. With my background in roles that offer versatility, given my experience in pitching, event handling, content writing, digital marketing, and management, always keen inculcating knowledge from diverse domains. Reach out to me in shreejeeagarwal405@gmail.com
